title: Mac OS X: Spore.Installer.Fix-dGE
description:
OUTDATED!
Please check this one: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4420786

--------------------------------------------------
<= Spore Installer OSX 10.4.11 Fix dGE =>

Tested on 1,66ghz Mac Mini
running OSX 10.4.11, using Intel GMA 950

NOTE: Only tested on my Mac Mini, don't come back to whine it isn't working!

Installation:

1. Run Installerfixed.app from anywhere you like with Spore CD in the cd-tray.
2. To get it run on 10.4.11, replace Spore.app info.plist with the one in the torrent. Put it in Spore.app -> Contents -> Info.plist. Make sure you replace the previous one.
3. Double click Spore.app and enjoy!

<= dGE =>


Basically a fix that makes spore run on os x 10.4.11 and with Intel GMA 950. READ THE NFO! If it isn't working properly, I can't help. Just thought to share this fix.

NOTE: Read the comments. You need to chmod the executables. Navigate to the same directory as Installerfixed.app and chmod +x following files by doing:

sudo chmod +x InstallerFixed.app/Contents/PkgInfo
sudo chmod +x InstallerFixed.app/Contents/MacOS/fileDispatcher
sudo chmod +x InstallerFixed.app/Contents/MacOS/tgInstall
sudo chmod +x InstallerFixed.app/Contents/MacOS/fileDispatcher.dSYM/Contents/Resources/DWARF/fileDispatcher

And if it does work, please come back to give feedback.
